mapper.select: select d.*,t.name from t_detail d,t_type t where user_id = #{id} and t.id=d.type_id order by update_time desc

SELECT d.id,d.title,d.update_time,d.views,d.first_picture,d.description,u.avatar as BlogUserAvatar,u.nickname as BlogUsername,t.id as typeId,t.name as typeName,u.id as userId FROM t_detail d JOIN t_user u ON d.user_id = u.id JOIN t_type t ON d.type_id = t.id ORDER BY d.update_time DESC
